body: Deceptive cover is deceptive, but good doujin is good.
osanajimi without NTR, thats sth you dont see often
nice art, hope this will get EN translation

Would like to see more relationship outside bed too, but well, ero manga need to make use of the pages available. Itto and Aoi are neighbors and childhood friend. Earlier (probably middle school) they did sex out of curiosity and had been doing it regularly. Itto got high libido, but he likes Aoi, and is quite worried because despite years of sexual relationship, they've never kissed. Aoi always seems lazy, but she didn't refuse his approach. One day, her friends talk about love and boyfriend, including how it feels good to be touched. Aoi starts realizing she's probably in love, and refused having sex. Itto pushes, and eventually told her, he likes her. Last chapter, after story, he did asks her out to a date, but she'd rather play with her phone. Author said his motivation is to draw lazy girl character like Aoi, although more expression would have been nice. Next work will be CG set though.
